about_the_game:
Venture forth into the unforgiving Realm of Ghur with the official 32-track soundtrack for Warhammer Age of Sigmar: Realms of Ruin. Battle rages between four unique factions to the sounds of epic brass sequences, grand orchestral melodies and tense, iconic tunes that bring the world of Warhammer Age of Sigmar to life like never before.

Music composed and produced by Edward Patrick White, Brian D’Oliveira & Harry Brokensha. Additional Music and Programming by Marcus Hedges, Jim Croft, Roland Berdo and Raphael Fimm. Vocals by BLÁNID
detailed_description:
Venture forth into the unforgiving Realm of Ghur with the official 32-track soundtrack for Warhammer Age of Sigmar: Realms of Ruin. Battle rages between four unique factions to the sounds of epic brass sequences, grand orchestral melodies and tense, iconic tunes that bring the world of Warhammer Age of Sigmar to life like never before.

Music composed and produced by Edward Patrick White, Brian D’Oliveira & Harry Brokensha. Additional Music and Programming by Marcus Hedges, Jim Croft, Roland Berdo and Raphael Fimm. Vocals by BLÁNID
